content: I have a use case where my questionnaire is multi-select, but also with a 'none of the above' option. If the user selects none of the above, the UI should stop any of the other options being selected. How can I communicate this to the UI in the Questionnaire resource?
The optionExclusive extension allows you to mark a particular option as being "exclusive" - meaning that if you choose that option, no others can be selected, even repeats=true for that question.
